verbs.description: [ARG0: social security checks] to [V: increase] [ARG1: 3 5 jump in january] reflects cost of living the 45 million americans on social security will receive 3 5 percent more in their checks from the government starting in january the largest increase under the nation retirement system in nearly a decade officials announced yesterday benefits will increase at the same rate for other groups covered by social security jump in social security 3 5 aarp washington gov george w bush united states vice president al gore social security trust fund office of personnel management john rother texas al gore
